paper_abstract: Uninorms, as binary operations on the unit interval, have been widely applied in fuzzy set theory. In this paper, we study uninorms with nilpotent underlying t-norm and t-conorm. We prove that such a uninorm belongs to U-min or U-max. Moreover, some construction methods of uninorms from given t-norm and t-conorm are discussed.
paper_title: Single-Point Characterization of Uninorms with Nilpotent Underlying T-Norm and T-Conorm
